price: (Ibrahimu) aravuga ati “Amahoro abe kuri wowe! Nzagusabira imbabazi kwa Nyagasani wanjye. Mu by’ukuri, ni Umunyempuhwe zihebuje kuri njye.”
arabic: قَالَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكَۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِي حَفِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla salāmun ʿalayka sa-astaghfiru laka rabbī innahu kāna bī ḥafiyyan
